name: Space Advanture (barish35)
description:
Magara Jam #4 'te 72 saatte yapılmıştır. STORY / HİKAYE

Mankind sets off on a journey

 to the farthest reaches of the universe. 

In space, however, 

there are numerous unknown threats. 

Signaling for assistance

 from a disabled spaceship. 

A new horror has emerged. 

This conflict has just begun 

when they attack our home planet Earth, 

and we must band together to combat them.

Insanoglu, evrenin en uzak noktalarina dogru

 bir yolculuga cikar. 

Ancak uzayda cok sayida bilinmeyen tehdit var. 

Bozuk bir uzay gemisinden

 yardim icin sinyal gonderiliyor. 

Yeni bir korku ortaya cikti. 

Bu catisma, gezegenimiz 

Dunya'ya saldirdiklarinda daha yeni basladi 

ve onlarla savasmak icin bir araya gelmeliyiz.

CONTROLS / KONTROLLER

WASD : Move

Left Mouse Click : Shoot

Shift: Sprint

C : Crounch 

R: Reload

GAMEJAM TAKIM

Barış Gürbüz : Game developer / 3d artist

KULLANDIĞIM ASSETLER

"Sci Fi Assault rifle laser blaster" (https://skfb.ly/6vZUF) by Artem Goyko is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 

Mixamo

MadRooster Sound Library 

MUSIC

Eric Satie : Trois Gymnopedies First Movement

Saint-Saens : Aquarium

Kevin MacLeod : Night of Chaos
